Interface IDecorator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.apache.wicket.util.io.IClusterable, org.apache.wicket.model.IDetachable, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoxDecorator, ColorDecorator, CtDecorator, FieldDecorator, FilterDecorator, LinkDecorator, ListDecorator, TooltipDecorator

    public interface IDecorator
extends org.apache.wicket.util.io.IClusterable, org.apache.wicket.model.IDetachable
    A IDecorator creates the panel for a given Field and a IEntity instance.
    Author:
    Jordi Deu-Pons
